title: San Salvatore monastery
description: A monastery founded in A.D. 753 by Desiderius, future king of the Lombards. Located in modern Brescia, Italy.

properties.description: Representative point location based on Google Earth imagery with reference to descriptions from Wikipedia and the UNESCO WHL, as well as locations of individual buildings as mapped in OpenStreetMap.
properties.title: Imagery Location of San Salvatore monastery
